patthana1.8:11.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.8:12.1_0: Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe dasa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbattha dasa.
patthana1.8:14.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.8:20.1_1: Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:20.1_2: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana1.8:23.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:24.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (naadhipatipaṭisandhikkhaṇe paripuṇṇaṁ) …
patthana1.8:25.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— pītisahagate khandhe paṭicca pītisahagatā cetanā.
patthana1.8:26.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— pītisahagate khandhe paṭicca sukhasahagatā cetanā.
patthana1.8:28.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā …pe….
patthana1.8:29.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— sukhasahagataṁ kāyaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:30.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—catuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:31.1_0: (Namaggapaccayā nahetupaccayasadisaṁ. Moho natthi. Navippayuttapaccayā paripuṇṇaṁ, arūpapañhameva.)
patthana1.8:32.1_0: Nahetuyā dasa, naadhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke dasa, najhāne dve, namagge dasa, navippayutte dasa.
patthana1.8:34.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte dasa, napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke navippayutte dasa.
patthana1.8:36.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dasa, anantare dasa, samanantare dasa, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne sabbe dasa, magge ekaṁ, sampayutte dasa, vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbe dasa.
patthana1.8:39.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:39.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:40.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:41.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:43.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:44.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.8:44.1_2: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:45.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:45.1_1: Ariyā pītisahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:45.1_2: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:45.1_3: taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:45.1_4: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:46.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:46.1_1: Ariyā sukhasahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:46.1_2: Pītisahagate khandhe sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:46.1_3: taṁ ārabbha sukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:46.1_4: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha sukhasahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:47.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:47.1_1: Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:47.1_2: Pītisahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:47.1_3: taṁ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.8:47.1_4: Cetopariyañāṇena pītisahagatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, pītisahagatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:47.1_5: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:48.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:48.1_1: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:48.1_2: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:48.1_3: taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:48.1_4: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:49.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:49.1_3: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—sukhasahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:50.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhāsahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:50.1_1: Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:50.1_2: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:50.1_3: taṁ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.8:50.1_7: Upekkhāsahagatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:50.1_8: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:51.1_2: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhāsahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā phalā vuṭṭhahitvā, taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:51.1_3: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:51.1_4: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:51.1_5: taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:51.1_6: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:52.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.8:52.1_2: upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.8:52.1_3: pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.8:52.1_4: taṁ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.8:52.1_6: Pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:52.1_7: Pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:53.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:54.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.8:54.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā pītisahagatena cittena taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā pītisahagatena cittena taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:54.1_2: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.8:54.1_3: taṁ garuṁ katvā pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:55.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

patthana1.8:101.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca saddhaṁ upanissāya upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe…
patthana1.8:101.1_5: patthanaṁ upanissāya upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe…
patthana1.8:102.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.8:102.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca saddhaṁ upanissāya pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.8:102.1_2: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ uppādeti, maggaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.8:102.1_3: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ … paññaṁ … rāgaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ …
patthana1.8:102.1_5: patthanaṁ upanissāya pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.8:102.1_8: Pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena adinnaṁ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṁ bhaṇati, samphaṁ palapati, sandhiṁ chindati, nillopaṁ harati, ekāgārikaṁ karoti, paripanthe tiṭṭhati, paradāraṁ gacchati, gāmaghātaṁ karoti, nigamaghātaṁ karoti.
patthana1.8:102.1_10: patthanā pītisahagatāya ca sukhasahagatāya ca saddhāya …pe…
patthana1.8:103.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:104.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:104.1_1: Pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ sukhasahagatassa gotrabhussa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:104.1_2: Pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ sukhasahagatassa vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:104.1_4: pītisahagataṁ vodānaṁ sukhasahagatassa maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:105.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.8:105.1_1: pītisahagataṁ vodānaṁ pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:106.1_2: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:107.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ upekkhāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.8:107.1_1: upekkhāsahagataṁ vodānaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:108.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.8:108.1_2: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.8:108.1_3: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca vodānaṁ pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:109.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.8:109.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:109.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:110.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.8:110.1_1: **Sahajātā**—pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:110.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:110.1_3: Nānākkhaṇikā—pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:111.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:111.1_1: Nānākkhaṇikā—pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ upekkhāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:112.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.8:112.1_1: **Sahajātā**—pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:112.1_3: Nānākkhaṇikā— pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:113.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa. (Cattāripi gaṇanāni passitvā kātabbāni.)
patthana1.8:114.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā …pe….
patthana1.8:115.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:116.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:117.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:118.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa.
patthana1.8:119.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagato vipāko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.8:119.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.8:120.1_0: (Yathā paṭiccavāre hetupaccaye evaṁ vitthāretabbā dasa pañhā.)
patthana1.8:121.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:122.1_0: Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa, aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa, āsevane dasa, kamme soḷasa, vipāke dasa, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā dasa, natthiyā soḷasa, vigate soḷasa, avigate dasa.
patthana1.8:125.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:126.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:127.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:128.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:129.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:130.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:131.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:132.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:133.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:134.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:135.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:136.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:137.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:138.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:139.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:140.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:141.1_0: Nahetuyā soḷasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate sabbattha soḷasa.
patthana1.8:144.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dasa, naadhipatiyā dasa, naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate sabbattha dasa.
patthana1.8:147.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa, aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa, āsevane dasa, kamme soḷasa, vipāke dasa, āhāre dasa, indriye dasa, jhāne dasa, magge dasa, sampayutte dasa, atthiyā dasa, natthiyā soḷasa, vigate soḷasa, avigate dasa.
